SELECT CAST(d.DEPT_NO AS VARCHAR2(50)) AS DEPT_NO, d.dept_name AS dept_name, CAST(d.dept_upstair AS VARCHAR2(100)) AS dept_upstair -- 부서번호와 동일한 데이터 유형으로 캐스팅 , 'Z' grade_level FROM TB_DEPARTMENT d
UNION ALL
SELECT mem_no AS MEM_NO, -- 사원번호 '[' || m.mem_grade || ']' || m.mem_name AS mem_name, -- 사원명 (MEM_NO 컬럼을 DEPT_NO로 변경) CAST(dept_no AS VARCHAR2(100)) AS dept_upstair -- 회원상위 (부서번호와 동일한 데이터 유형으로 캐스팅) ,grade_level FROM tb_mem m WHERE STATUS = 'Y' order by grade_level

select m.mem_name , m.mem_grade , d.dept_name , m.mem_email , m.phone , m.extension_number , m.profile_img_path from tb_mem m join tb_department d on m.dept_no = d.dept_no where m.status = 'Y' and m.mem_no= #{employeeId}
